parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description:
The ID of the region where the vSwitch is deployed.

You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~36063~~) operation to query the most recent region list.

parameters.name: VSwitchCidrReservationDescription
parameters.description:
The new description of the reserved CIDR block. The default value is empty.

The description must be 2 to 256 characters in length. It must start with a letter and cannot start with `http://` or `https://`.

parameters.name: VSwitchCidrReservationId
parameters.description: The ID of the reserved CIDR block.

parameters.name: VSwitchCidrReservationName
parameters.description:
The new name of the reserved CIDR block.

The name must be 2 to 128 characters in length and can contain letters, digits, underscores (\_), and hyphens (-). It must start with a letter.
